storyTitle: As Project Manager, I want to generate task status reports to monitor project progress

testCases.title: Validate task status report generation with valid filters
preconditions: User is logged in with Project Manager role
At least one project exists in the system with tasks
Task data is available in the project management database
User has appropriate permissions to access task status reporting module

steps.action: Navigate to task status reporting module from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Task status report UI is displayed with filter options, report generation button, and empty report area

steps.action: Select a valid project from the project dropdown filter
steps.expectedResult: Project is selected and displayed in the filter section without any validation errors

steps.action: Select a valid date range using the date range picker
steps.expectedResult: Date range is accepted and displayed in the filter section

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button to request report generation
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays a loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete
steps.expectedResult: Task status report is generated within 15 seconds and displayed with correct data including progress percentages, completion status, and overdue tasks for the selected project and date range

steps.action: Verify report contains task names, assignees, status, progress percentage, and due dates
steps.expectedResult: All task details are accurately displayed in the report matching the database records

postconditions: Task status report is displayed on screen
Report data matches the selected filters
User remains on the task status reporting page
Report is available for export

testCases.title: Verify export functionality for task status reports
preconditions: User is logged in with Project Manager role
Task status reporting module is accessible
At least one project with tasks exists in the system
Browser allows file downloads
User has permissions to export reports

steps.action: Navigate to task status reporting module
steps.expectedResult: Task status report UI is displayed with filter options

steps.action: Select a valid project and date range filters
steps.expectedResult: Filters are applied successfully

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button to generate task status report with filters
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated and displayed on screen with task data including progress, status, and overdue information

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel file download

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file and verify contents
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is downloaded successfully with accurate data matching the on-screen report, including all columns, task details, and formatting

steps.action: Return to the task status report page and click 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF file download

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file and verify contents
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is downloaded with correct formatting, all task data is readable, and layout matches the report structure

postconditions: Excel file is saved to downloads folder with accurate report data
PDF file is saved to downloads folder with proper formatting
Original report remains displayed on screen
No data corruption or loss during export

testCases.title: Ensure unauthorized users cannot access task status reports
preconditions: Test user account exists without Project Manager role
Task status reporting module exists in the system
Role-based access control is configured
API endpoint /api/reports/taskstatus is active

steps.action: Login to the application as a non-project manager user (e.g., Developer or Viewer role)
steps.expectedResult: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their default dashboard

steps.action: Attempt to navigate to the task status reporting module via the main menu or direct URL
steps.expectedResult: Access to task status reporting module is denied with an appropriate error message such as 'Access Denied' or 'Insufficient Permissions', and user is redirected to an error page or their dashboard

steps.action: Verify that the task status reporting menu option is not visible in the navigation
steps.expectedResult: Task status reporting module link is not displayed in the user's navigation menu

steps.action: Open browser developer tools and attempt to access the API endpoint directly by sending a GET request to /api/reports/taskstatus
steps.expectedResult: API returns HTTP 403 Forbidden response with an error message indicating insufficient permissions

steps.action: Verify the response body contains appropriate error details
steps.expectedResult: Response includes error code and message such as 'Access forbidden: Project Manager role required'

postconditions: Unauthorized user cannot access task status reports
Security logs record the unauthorized access attempt
User session remains active but restricted to authorized features
No sensitive report data is exposed to unauthorized user

storyTitle: As Project Manager, I want task status reports to identify overdue tasks to prioritize work

testCases.title: Validate overdue task detection in task status reports
preconditions: User is logged in with Project Manager role
At least one project exists with tasks that have passed their due dates
System clock is accurate and synchronized
Task status reporting module is accessible
Overdue task detection logic is configured in the system

steps.action: Navigate to task status reporting module
steps.expectedResult: Task status report UI is displayed with filter options and report generation controls

steps.action: Select a project that contains tasks with overdue dates from the project filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Project is selected successfully

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button to generate task status report with overdue tasks
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and generates the report within 15 seconds

steps.action: Review the generated report and identify tasks marked as overdue
steps.expectedResult: Report highlights overdue tasks correctly with visual indicators such as red text, warning icons, or highlighted rows. Overdue tasks show due dates that are earlier than the current date

steps.action: Verify that all tasks with due dates in the past are flagged as overdue
steps.expectedResult: 100% accuracy in overdue task detection - all tasks past their due date are marked as overdue, and no false positives exist

steps.action: Apply additional filter to show only overdue tasks by project
steps.expectedResult: Report refreshes and displays only overdue tasks for the selected project

steps.action: Filter report by a specific assignee who has overdue tasks
steps.expectedResult: Filtered report shows overdue tasks assigned only to the selected assignee within the chosen project

steps.action: Verify overdue task count matches the filtered results
steps.expectedResult: Summary statistics show correct count of overdue tasks matching the displayed results

postconditions: Report accurately displays all overdue tasks with proper highlighting
Filtered views show correct subset of overdue tasks
No tasks are incorrectly flagged as overdue
Report remains available for further filtering or export

testCases.title: Verify export of task status reports with overdue task highlights
preconditions: User is logged in with Project Manager role
At least one project exists with overdue tasks
Task status reporting module is accessible
Browser allows file downloads
Export functionality supports overdue task highlighting

steps.action: Navigate to task status reporting module
steps.expectedResult: Task status report UI is displayed

steps.action: Select a project with overdue tasks and apply relevant filters
steps.expectedResult: Filters are applied successfully

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button to generate task status report with overdue highlights
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated and displayed on screen with overdue tasks clearly highlighted using visual indicators

steps.action: Verify that overdue tasks are visually distinguished in the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: Overdue tasks are highlighted with distinct formatting such as red text, bold font, or colored background

steps.action: Click 'Export to Excel' button to export the report
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel file download

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file and locate overdue tasks
steps.expectedResult: Excel file includes overdue task highlights with formatting preserved - overdue tasks are marked with cell colors, conditional formatting, or special indicators that distinguish them from on-time tasks

steps.action: Verify all overdue tasks in the Excel file match those shown in the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: All overdue tasks are present in the Excel export with accurate data and consistent highlighting

steps.action: Return to the report page and click 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF file download

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file and verify overdue task highlights are preserved
steps.expectedResult: PDF file displays overdue tasks with visual highlights maintained, formatting is clear and readable

postconditions: Excel file contains all overdue tasks with proper highlighting
PDF file contains all overdue tasks with visual indicators
Exported files accurately reflect the on-screen report
Overdue task formatting is preserved across all export formats
